state.code:
sequenceDiagram
    participant browser
    participant server

    Note right of browser: User inputs new note in the text field and clicks Save button

    browser->>server: POST https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/new_note_spa
    activate server
    Note right of server: Server saves the new note to the database
    server-->>browser: JSON data (including the new note)
    deactivate server

    Note right of browser: The browser updates the notes list with the new note without refreshing the page

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/data.json
    activate server
    Note right of server: Server sends back the updated list of notes
    server-->>browser: JSON data (updated list of notes)
    deactivate server

    Note right of browser: The browser executes the callback function to render the updated notes on the page

sequenceDiagram
    participant browser
    participant server

    browser->>server: CREATE https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/notes
    activate server
    server-->>browser: the HTML file
    deactivate server
    
    Note right of browser: User inputs new note in the text field and clicks save button

    browser->>server: POST https://fullstack-exampleapp.herokuapp.com/new_note_spa
    activate server
    server-->>browser: JSON data
    deactivate server


    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/main.js
    activate server
    server-->>browser: the JavaScript file
    deactivate server

    Note right of browser: The browser starts executing the JavaScript code that fetches the JSON from the server

    browser->>server: GET https://studies.cs.helsinki.fi/exampleapp/data.json
    activate server
    server-->>browser: [{ "content": "HTML is easy", "date": "2023-1-1" }, ... ]
    deactivate server

    Note right of browser: The browser executes the callback function that renders the notes

sequenceDiagram
    Alice->>+John: Hello John, how are you?
    Alice->>+John: John, can you hear me?
    John-->>-Alice: Hi Alice, I can hear you!
    John-->>-Alice: I feel great!
